name: Jerodius Caravan
description:
Made for the Gunner Parade ‘22 Game Jam.  It’s a 2 minute caravan score attack shmup/stg/shooter.  This was made in my free time over a week, it’s a little rough but it’s my first “published” game so it’s a milestone for me.  I hope to continue with this and make it a full game someday.

The theme for the jam was “disaster.”  The back story for this game that goes with that is a planet was destroyed by an enemy missile and you are racing to prevent it from  happening to your home world as well.

 Controls

WASD - move ship

Left - narrow shot

Right - wide shot

Down - shield (3 second charge)

Gameplay Info

Collect yellow Xs to boost multiplier based on your current kill streak.

Enemies escaping makes you loose 10% of your multiplier.

Getting killed looses 50% of your multiplier.

Lives /credits are unlimited, but you are penalized with a low multiplier

2 minute time limit.

Thank you for checking this out

GLHF!  Any and all feedback is welcome!
